subtitle: About Me
content: Late last year I decided to move back to Australia after spending a few years over seas. Part of that move was to make a career change. I have always been a hobbyist programmer, but I wanted to make the next step.

subtitle: Experience
content: I am currently working as a freelance web designer, and fullstack developer

subtitle: Before
content: Previously I was working in aviation managing engine repairs for 737s. Also spent over  a decade working with some of the world's top chef's as a Sommelier (Shannon Bennet, Gordon Ramsay, Guillaume Brahimi, Phillipe Mouchel)

subtitle: Recently on my bedside table
content:
• Doing Agile right, Darrell Rigby [current]
  • The Shadow Rising, Robert Jordan [current]
  • Deep Learning for Coders with fastai & PyTorch, Jeremy Howard & Sylvain Gugger [current]
  • Deep Work, Cal Newport
  • The Phoenix Project, Gene Kim, Kevin Behr, George Spafford
  • The Pragmatic Programmer, David Thomas & Andrew Hunt
  • Sapiens, Yuval Noah Haarari
  • Breathe, James Nestor
  • Infinite Powers, Steven Strogatz
  • Our Mathematical Universe, Max Tegmark
  • Head First C#, Andrew Stellman
  • Mastering Bitcoin, Andreas Antonopoulos
  • The Carnivore Code, Paul Saladino
  • Python Tricks the Book, Dan Bader
